cab.content: Military Secret.109252/5 .From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India, 1 -1 - " * 22nd September 1919.12952. 22nd September. No. 103.Part I. 1. All is quiet north of Kuram, about 400 Afridi Militia deserters are reported to have left Tirah for Kabul.2. Nadir Khan is reported to have (? invited) Waziri, Mahsud and Bhittani representatives to Khost to accompany him to Kabul. Mahsuds reported likely to refuse.3. Raids in Derajat continue. The Afghans at Wana are reported to be arranging to withdraw. Again said that the Waziris intend to detain them until they hear definitely whether they are included in peace terms. Reference to my Serial No. 96 of 28th August. Unconfirmed report "states that Shah Daulah has ordered Mahsuds and Waziris not to raid.4. Powindab are reported to be coming down to India, their annual migration.Part II. 5. Zarkani was attacked on 19th September. Details not yet received.Communicated to Press.
